page.title: Summer Camp
page.content:
You can't have Scouting without "outing". The Outdoor Program is one of the principal features of Scouting that appeals to boys, and a week at Summer Camp is the highest experience.

Summer Camp 2020 will be June 19th to 25th at Camp Rainey Mountain located in the mountains of North Georgia.

Please consider giving your son an experience that he will remember for a lifetime.

Summer Camp Checklist - Printable\ Camp Rainey Mountain Signup Form - [Printable](assets/files/CRM Form Printable.pdf)\ 2016 CRM Course Schedule
